name: Vaxep
description:
Vaxep is a Splatoon with future tarkov multiplayer mechanics based on photon but this prototype does not include online mechanics, the whole game is made by us except for a couple of shaders. (I have experince in photon)

BUGS: not touch the water and the dead is buged: sry :(

how to play: use your left mouse plus wasd to move and paint the scenario, and you can only walk on pink paint that will disappear, and you can paint with the mouse.

 team: Ave members: carlos vera avelino y oscar vera avelino (Carlos93#1844 y OscarVera#2687)

Themes: Theme 6: Try it in company, Theme 3: Tell a story again
